attributes.action: Repeal the law which allows homosexuals and lesbians to adopt children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the people of Great Britain, ask the Prime Minister Gordon Brown, as a man of morality, and good statue to repeal the immoral act of parliament which permits homosexuals and lesbians adopting children, as it is immoral for children to be corrupted in this way.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
